price: 47. Tokkel Ni astooti luk keenil yemeete waqdi, usun too waqdi teetil yusuuleenih anqasah.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahum biāyātinā idhā hum min'hā yaḍḥakūna
